00018 Controller::Controller(Whorl* ptr_whorl)
00019 {
00020         m_whorl = ptr_whorl;
00021         A = FindA();
00022         MOI_sw = FindMOI_sw();
00023 }
00024 
00025 Matrix Controller::FindA()
00026 {
00027         
00028         static int wheel_num = m_whorl->GetMomentumWheel("Wheel1")->GetWheelCount();
00029         Matrix temp(wheel_num,3);
00030         static char number[33];
00031         string wheel("Wheel");
00032         string name;
00033         for (int ii =1;ii<=wheel_num;ii++)
00034         {
00035                 sprintf(number,"%d",ii);
00036                 string name =wheel+number;
00037                 MomentumWheel *whl = m_whorl->GetMomentumWheel(name);
00038                 Vector tempVect = whl->GetWheelAxis();
00039                 temp(_,ii)=tempVect;
00040         }                       
00041         return temp;
00042 }
00043 
00044 Matrix Controller::FindMOI_sw()
00045 {
00046         
00047         static int wheel_num = m_whorl->GetMomentumWheel("Wheel1")->GetWheelCount();
00048         Matrix temp(wheel_num,wheel_num);
00049         static char number[33];
00050         string wheel("Wheel");
00051         string name;
00052         for (int ii =1;ii<=wheel_num;ii++)
00053         {
00054                 sprintf(number,"%d",ii);
00055                 string name =wheel+number;
00056                 temp(ii,ii)=m_whorl->GetMomentumWheel(name)->GetAxialInertia();
00057         }                       
00058         return temp;
00059 }
00060 
00061 int Controller::SetWheelTorque(Vector Torque)
00062 {
00063         static int wheel_num = m_whorl->GetMomentumWheel("Wheel1")->GetWheelCount();
00064         static char number[33];
00065         string wheel("Wheel");
00066         string name;
00067         for (int ii = 1;ii<=wheel_num;ii++)
00068         {
00069                 sprintf(number,"%d",ii);
00070                 string name = wheel+number;
00071                 m_whorl->GetMomentumWheel(name)->SetWheelTorque(Torque(ii));
00072         }
00073         return 0;
00074 }
